testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlDetectorDataRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.1.6 [Need for Detector Data Sharing] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Send Detector Data Upon Request (NTRM 3.3.5.2.3.1}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N23R466_Send_Detector_Data_Upon_Request_Parameter = ${TMDD_N23R466_Send_Detector_Data_Upon_Request_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Detector Data is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N23R475_Restrictions___Detector_Data_Supported = ${TMDD_N23R475_Restrictions___Detector_Data_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Detector Station - Detector Data is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N23R476_Detector_Station___Detector_Data_Supported = ${TMDD_N23R476_Detector_Station___Detector_Data_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Count is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N23R477_Vehicle_Count_Supported = ${TMDD_N23R477_Vehicle_Count_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Average Vehicle Occupancy is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N23R478_Average_Vehicle_Occupancy_Supported = ${TMDD_N23R478_Average_Vehicle_Occupancy_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Data Collection Start is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N23R479_Data_Collection_Start_Supported = ${TMDD_N23R479_Data_Collection_Start_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Data Collection End is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N23R480_Data_Collection_End_Supported = ${TMDD_N23R480_Data_Collection_End_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Data Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N23R481_Data_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N23R481_Data_Type_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Average Vehicle Speed is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N23R482_Average_Vehicle_Speed_Supported = ${TMDD_N23R482_Average_Vehicle_Speed_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Average Vehicle Queue is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N23R483_Average_Vehicle_Queue_Supported = ${TMDD_N23R483_Average_Vehicle_Queue_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Stops is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N23R484_Vehicle_Stops_Supported = ${TMDD_N23R484_Vehicle_Stops_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Count - Bin 1 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N23R485_Vehicle_Count___Bin_1_Supported = ${TMDD_N23R485_Vehicle_Count___Bin_1_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Count - Bin 2 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N23R486_Vehicle_Count___Bin_2_Supported = ${TMDD_N23R486_Vehicle_Count___Bin_2_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Count - Bin 3 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N23R487_Vehicle_Count___Bin_3_Supported = ${TMDD_N23R487_Vehicle_Count___Bin_3_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Count - Bin 4 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N23R488_Vehicle_Count___Bin_4_Supported = ${TMDD_N23R488_Vehicle_Count___Bin_4_Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Count - Bin 5 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N23R489_Vehicle_Count___Bin_5_Supported = ${TMDD_N23R489_Vehicle_Count___Bin_5_Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Count - Bin 6 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.16). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N23R490_Vehicle_Count___Bin_6_Supported = ${TMDD_N23R490_Vehicle_Count___Bin_6_Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Count - Bin 7 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.17). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N23R491_Vehicle_Count___Bin_7_Supported = ${TMDD_N23R491_Vehicle_Count___Bin_7_Supported}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N23R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N23R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}
Step 21 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 23 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 24 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDetectorDataRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N23R466_Send_Detector_Data_Upon_Request_Parameter REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected

Step 25 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 25.1 VERIFY that a detectorDataMsg message was received.
Step 25.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item
Step 25.3 VERIFY that a detector-id data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 25.4 VERIFY that a detection-time-stamp data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 25.5 IF TMDD_N23R475_Restrictions___Detector_Data_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.5.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item
Step 25.6 IF TMDD_N23R476_Detector_Station___Detector_Data_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.6.1 VERIFY that a station-id data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 25.7 IF TMDD_N23R477_Vehicle_Count_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.7.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-count data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 25.8 IF TMDD_N23R478_Average_Vehicle_Occupancy_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.8.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-occupancy data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 25.9 IF TMDD_N23R479_Data_Collection_Start_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.9.1 VERIFY that a start-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 25.10 IF TMDD_N23R480_Data_Collection_End_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.10.1 VERIFY that an end-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 25.11 IF TMDD_N23R481_Data_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.11.1 VERIFY that a detector-data-type data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 25.12 IF TMDD_N23R482_Average_Vehicle_Speed_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.12.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-speed data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 25.13 IF TMDD_N23R483_Average_Vehicle_Queue_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.13.1 VERIFY that a queue-length data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 25.14 IF TMDD_N23R484_Vehicle_Stops_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.14.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-stops data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 25.15 IF TMDD_N23R485_Vehicle_Count___Bin_1_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.15.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-count-bin1 data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 25.16 IF TMDD_N23R486_Vehicle_Count___Bin_2_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.16.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-count-bin2 data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 25.17 IF TMDD_N23R487_Vehicle_Count___Bin_3_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.17.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-count-bin3 data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 25.18 IF TMDD_N23R488_Vehicle_Count___Bin_4_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.18.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-count-bin4 data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 25.19 IF TMDD_N23R489_Vehicle_Count___Bin_5_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.19.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-count-bin5 data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 25.20 IF TMDD_N23R490_Vehicle_Count___Bin_6_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.20.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-count-bin6 data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 25.21 IF TMDD_N23R491_Vehicle_Count___Bin_7_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.21.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-count-bin7 data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 25.22 VERIFY that the values within the RESPONSE message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 26 IF ErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 26.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 26.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 26.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 26.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 26.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 26.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to ErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 26.7 IF TMDD_N23R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 27 EXIT
